Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a video without any additional evidence or sources to confirm its authenticity.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video shows the Indonesian plane crash in January 2021 without providing any concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the video, as it has been debunked by AFP's Africa fact-check team after it circulated in false posts about an Ethiopian Airlines plane crash in 2019.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video actually shows heavy turbulence on an Etihad Airways flight traveling from Abu Dhabi to Jakarta on May 4, 2016.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the video by presenting it as evidence of the Indonesian plane crash in January 2021, despite the lack of supporting evidence.
